2024-09-14 21:00:33 565: I think I have the flu
2024-09-14 21:00:35 416:
I'm sorry to hear that you're not feeling well. The flu is a viral infection that can cause a variety of symptoms. Can you describe your symptoms in more detail? Common flu symptoms include:

- Fever
- Chills
- Muscle or body aches
- Fatigue (tiredness)
- Cough
- Sore throat
- Runny or stuffy nose
- Headache
- Vomiting and diarrhea (more common in children than in adults)

Also, please let me know if you have any underlying health conditions or if you're taking any medications. This information can help provide you with the best advice.
